Words cannot express how much I love this movie. Thanks so much for uploading it. Kinda wish you'd done a smaller sized upload, but I guess I'll just keep this copy around for years, to be viewed on a huge TV screen instead of my tiny laptop.

The quality is not so good at all. What's the point in making a "cheap" 1080p with poor bitrate and a lot of artifacts? A standard brrip looks better than this. I suggest downloading the 10 GBs 1080p for real quality lovers.
